Uses of Class
healthABM.Treatment

    • Uses of Treatment in healthABM

      Methods in healthABM that return Treatment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Treatment Illness.getCheapestSelfTreatment()
      Returns the cheapest self-administered treatment.
      Treatment Provider.selectTreatment(Illness diagnosis, double severity)
      This method selects the best treatment considering a series of elements such as the cost, cost-effectiveness, the marginal profit for the provider and the severity of the medical condition
      Methods in healthABM that return types with arguments of type Treatment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Treatment> Illness.getTreatments(healthABM.TreatmentType type)
      Returns an array list of all treatments of a given type.
      Methods in healthABM with parameters of type Treatment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int ComparatorTreatmentByEfficiency.compare(Treatment t1, Treatment t2)
      Compares two treatments based on their efficiency in terms of deltaSeverity per cost.
